channel.title: Comments on: Interior Trim Refinishing Part 2

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/12/interior-trim-refinishing-part-2/#comment-115505">Juan Hernandez</a>.
Even easier, I will actually be selling those suede covers soon. Email me if you're interested from the Contact page.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Juan Hernandez.

Even easier, I will actually be selling those suede covers soon. Email me if you’re interested from the Contact page.

item.title: By: Juan Hernandez
item.dc:creator: Juan Hernandez
item.description: Love your build been following it for a while now. I have a few questions if you don’t mind. About how much a yard was the red suede? What is the color code for that red? Can you recommend a good shop to order it from? Well thank you for your time about to park the car for the winter and wanted to get the seats done while she sits.
item.content:encoded:
Love your build been following it for a while now. I have a few questions if you don’t mind.
About how much a yard was the red suede?
What is the color code for that red?
Can you recommend a good shop to order it from?
Well thank you for your time about to park the car for the winter and wanted to get the seats done while she sits.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/12/interior-trim-refinishing-part-2/#comment-75087">Brian L</a>.
Thanks Brian! How's that Supra of yours going?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Brian L.

Thanks Brian! How’s that Supra of yours going?

item.title: By: Brian L
item.dc:creator: Brian L
item.description: I haven't been to your site in some time and when I finally had a chance to check it out, I am pleasantly surprised at all the massive progress that's been going on with your FD. Good stuff bro, you never disapoint.
item.content:encoded: I haven’t been to your site in some time and when I finally had a chance to check it out, I am pleasantly surprised at all the massive progress that’s been going on with your FD. Good stuff bro, you never disapoint.
